```{r setup}
library(ResNatSeed)
```

You can install *ResNatSeed* in R environment by running the following code:

```
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("MarcoPittarello/ResNatSeed",build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

Otherwise, *ResNatSeed* is available as a ShinyApp version at the following web address:

[https://marco-pittarello.shinyapps.io/ResNatSeed_ShinyApp/](https://marco-pittarello.shinyapps.io/ResNatSeed_ShinyApp/)
